long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Using Banner+, you can save your CRNs to your dedicated options page. Then on registration day, simply click the extension icon in your browser to automatically insert all of your CRNs. You can learn more about and test Banner+ at this website:
https://michaelrfoster.github.io/banner-plus/
